resources.string: The characteristics are changed. Retest allows you to complete the test accessibility of the object
Are you sure you want to exit the application?
It is on the site of Meylan, Isère, as Ocara rises

OCARA, Control Tool and Real Analysis access is primarily an application for performing a local welcoming employees self-diagnosis of accessibility. It operates on a user path logic; through an elaborate set of rules, it allows to audit any type of object or service area, according to a multi-disability approach.
It is a complete and autonomous tool, which can be associated with gambling scalable and customizable rules.

Ocara is developed by Orange Labs for Mission Insertion Handicap Orange. Accessibility proposed rules, inspired by the ERP have been developed for the needs of company employees. But Ocara can integrate other rule sets, you rule sets!
Orange Ocara decided to open-source so that all companies, associations and individuals concerned about accessibility, can use this tool and contribute to its development.

Accessibility is a common cause which comes within the framework of the policies of Corporate Social Responsibility. It should become an integral part of the policies of welfare and health, and social efficiency factor.
And it is by pooling our resources, by sharing, we will go further together.
It is on the site of Meylan, Isère, as Ocara rises
